delete-dialog.title: Delete Space
delete-dialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete space '{{name}}'?

enable.title: Enable SSH Access
enable.prompt: Please confirm that you wish to enable SSH access for space '{{name}}'.
enable.error: An error occurred enabling SSH Access for the space.

disable.title: Disable SSH Access
disable.prompt: Please confirm that you wish to disable SSH access for space '{{name}}'.
disable.error: An error occurred disabling SSH Access for the space.
